softwareApplication.name: Flowxtra ATS Recruiting Software
softwareApplication.description: Flowxtra ATS is a free applicant tracking system tailored for US hiring teams. It offers unlimited job postings, AI-powered candidate filtering, multiposting, and collaboration workflows — fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, CPRA, and EEO guidelines.

offers.name: Free Forever Plan – Unlimited Job Postings

featureList: GDPR, CCPA, CPRA, and EEO compliance

mainEntity.name: Is Flowxtra ATS free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Flowxtra ATS includes a Free Forever plan with unlimited job postings, AI filtering, and multiposting. Paid plans unlock advanced analytics, custom fields, and API access.

mainEntity.name: Can I post jobs to multiple US boards at once?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Flowxtra's multiposting pushes openings to Google Jobs, LinkedIn, Facebook, and 50+ job boards in one click.
